com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api

Interface IPersistorDriver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICoalesceComponent, ICoalesceSetup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDriver, IntervalDriverImpl, PropertyDriverImpl

    public interface IPersistorDriver
extends ICoalesceComponent, ICoalesceSetup
    This interface is for creating driver implementations to perform some operation(s) based the result set of a scan.
    Author:
    n78554

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setOperations(IPersistorOperation... operations)
      Specified a list of operations that should be performed on the result set that was provided by the scanner.
      void setScan(IPersistorScan scan)
      Specifies what scanner to use for obtaining a result set.
      void start()
      Starts the driver.
      void stop()
      Stops the driver.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.incadencecorp.coalesce.api.ICoalesceComponent

        getName, getProperties, setName, setProperties, setPropertyLoader

      • Methods inherited from interface com.incadencecorp.coalesce.api.ICoalesceSetup

        setup

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the driver.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the driver. Cleanup any threads or other memory that was used.
